mapper.select: SELECT m.anotherMajorId, m.score, m.year, m.semester, m.type, s.name otherMajorName, d.departmentName FROM another_major m LEFT JOIN subject s ON m.anotherMajorId=s.id LEFT JOIN department d ON m.departmentId=d.id WHERE m.studentId= #{userNumber};

SELECT ssg.*, sub.name subjectName, m.departmentId, d.departmentName FROM student_subject_grade ssg JOIN student s ON ssg.id = s.id LEFT JOIN subject sub ON ssg.subjectId = sub.id RIGHT JOIN major_list m ON m.majorSubjectId = ssg.subjectId JOIN department d ON m.departmentId = d.id WHERE ssg.id = #{userNumber} and m.departmentId NOT IN (#{departmentId}) ORDER BY ssg.yearOfClass, ssg.yearOfSemester;
